MCQ: What is the main focus of machine learning?
Choices: a: Data visualization | b: Developing statistical algorithms | c: Creating artificial neural networks | d: Building robots

MCQ: Which field has machine learning NOT been applied to?
Choices: a: Natural language processing | b: Agriculture | c: Music production | d: Medicine

MCQ: What provides the mathematical foundations for machine learning?
Choices: a: Data mining | b: Computational statistics | c: Mathematical optimization | d: Artificial intelligence

MCQ: Which field focuses on exploratory data analysis through unsupervised learning?
Choices: a: Machine learning | b: Data mining | c: Artificial intelligence | d: Predictive analytics

MCQ: What framework provides a theoretical viewpoint for describing machine learning?
Choices: a: Artificial intelligence | b: Data mining | c: Probably approximately correct (PAC) learning | d: Computational statistics
